name: BINKY XVII: Doom Ray Day
description:
If you have the time, please read "onMasterSlaveAndGodotDevelopers" in txt or pdf formats

The seventeenth in the award winning BINKY Series!

Destroy! Destroy! Destroy!

Evil doctor ROBOLLOYD has captured BINKY finally! Though that is not enough... with the DOOM RAY, Anti-Venus shall be destroyed!!! Can BINKY save the day?

Controls:

W - UP

A - LEFT

S - DOWN

D - RIGHT

SPACE - Turn on DOOM RAY!!!

Esc - Quit Game

Credits:

Various from Klik and Play

Raygun Big Pboat by Anthony Appleyard https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Aa_raygun_big_pboat_sp_01_wsb.jpg

Venus by NASA https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Venuspioneeruv.jpg Explosion by unknown

Cage from WarioWare: Touched! ripped by redblueyellow

Brick Texture by Microsoft

Reims Apse by Charles Moore https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Fig_48_-Aperture_of_the_Apse_of_Reims.jpg

Sound effects from Roblox

Sound effects from The Phantom Planet (1961)

Sound effects from Team Fortress 2

Sound effects from Klik and Play

Music: Cheetahmen from Action 52
